mapper.select: select * from t_offer order by note, lowestPrice
mapper.insert: insert into t_offer (productId, price, lowestPrice, productName, note, quantity, manufacturer, platform, amount, productKey, shippingGroupId) values (#{id}, #{price}, #{lowestPrice}, #{productName}, #{note}, #{quantity}, #{manufacturer}, #{platform}, #{amount}, #{productKey}, #{shippingGroup.id})
mapper.update: update t_offer set productName=#{productName}, price=#{price}, quantity=#{quantity}, manufacturer=#{manufacturer}, productKey=#{productKey}, shippingGroupId=#{shippingGroup.id} where productId=#{id}
